title: Make it possible to edit the Package Identity Name of an app after its been published.
body: Currently it is not possible to change the package identity name of an app once it has been published, which is a bit frustrating.

comments.body: Yes, It cause me trouble too. When I reserve an app name, the website auto-assign some random Package Identity Name. However if I use that I face an issue with CORS in my app. I wish at least let me specify it during app creation.
